layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x38
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x38
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x22
layer at (8,8) size 784x22
  LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x22
    LayoutText {#text} at (23,4) size 4x17
      text run at (23,4) width 4: " "
    LayoutBlockFlow {SPAN} at (27,18) size 20x0
    LayoutText {#text} at (47,4) size 4x17
      text run at (47,4) width 4: " "
    LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 0x0
layer at (13,11) size 15x15
  LayoutBlockFlow (relative positioned) {INPUT} at (5,3) size 15x15
layer at (63,11) size 15x15
  LayoutBlockFlow (relative positioned) {INPUT} at (55,3) size 15x15
